channel.title: GG on Losinggeneration Coding Blog
channel.description: Recent content in GG on Losinggeneration Coding Blog

item.title: Sega Master System Coding
item.description: Besides updating my server, I’ve been quite busy with some Sega Master System (SMS from here-on-out) coding. I’ve decided to switch to SMS for now instead of Game Gear for now. It seems I’ve kind of went my own way with this project. From the looks of it, most people either use WLA-DX or, to a much lesser extent, z88dk. I don’t see too much about any other assemblers/compilers. Granted, I haven’t looked terribly hard for the topics though.
